sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均含有"欺骗"之意。
means: cheat ： 普通用词，指用蒙蔽他人的手段取得所需之物，尤多指在赢利的买卖中欺骗人。
deceive ： 最普通用词，指用虚假外表使人信以为真，或蓄意歪曲事实，或造成错误印象使人上当受骗。
trick ： 指用阴谋诡计等骗得信任或得到所需之物。
fool ： 指把别人当傻瓜，愚弄欺骗别人。

sentence.Network_en: The boys, if my eyes did not deceive me, were praying.
sentence.Network_cn: 如果我没有看错的话，那些男孩子正在祈祷。

sentence.Network_en: I think this is just a government ploy to deceive the public.
sentence.Network_cn: 我认为这只是政府欺骗公众的手段.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 欺字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 欺蒙〖 hoodwink〗 欺骗〖 deceive;cheat;dupe〗 欺巧〖 alert〗.
罔字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 诬,无中生有〖 slander〗 欺骗;蒙蔽〖 hoodwink;deceive〗 无;没有〖 not〗.
字母D开头的单词_百度知道 ... decade n. 十年，十年期 deceive v. 欺骗，蒙骗 decent a. 正派的；体面的.
正宗长垣话！_长垣吧_百度贴吧 ... ①敲击[ knock] ②骗人。[ cheat;deceive] 46 戕洗（ qiang xi）.

list.abs: o let not time deceive you ., 哦 , 还是不要让时间欺骗你吧.
in other words , Satan told them , God wasn't their friend after all. effect he was saying , " would a friend deceive you ? "换句话说，撒旦告诉他们，上帝毕竟不是他们的朋友，实际上撒旦在说：“朋友会骗你吗？
oral sex的意思中文翻译 ... deceive 欺骗, 行骗 deceive oneself 骗自己误解, 想错 deceiver 欺人者, 欺诈者.
"deceive"怎么说合适-翻译"deceive"... ... deceive vt 欺骗; deceive oneself 骗自己，误解，想错; 掩耳盗铃; to deceive 糊弄.
2008年2月27日 - then you are certainly deceiving yourself. ;那你肯定是在欺骗自己. Sincerity is the base of friendship.Good friends shouldn't deceive each.
Guy 的变体 Guyler [英格兰人姓氏] 盖勒。绰号，欺骗者，来源于中世纪英语，含义是“欺瞒”(to deceive)＋er。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French deceivre, from Latin decipere 'catch, ensnare, cheat'

entry.def: If you deceive someone, you make them believe something that is not true, usually in order to get some advantage for yourself.

example.ex: He has deceived and disillusioned us all...
example.tran: 他欺骗了大家，让我们失望至极。

example.ex: If you can make the last 10 seconds exciting, you can deceive your audience into thinking it's been like that all along.
example.tran: 如果能让最后 10 秒钟紧张刺激，就可以给观众造成场面一直都是如此的假象。

entry.def: If you deceive yourself, you do not admit to yourself something that you know is true.

example.ex: Alcoholics are notorious for their ability to deceive themselves about the extent of their problem.
example.tran: 酗酒者善于在自身问题的严重性上自欺欺人，这是人所共知的。

entry.def: If something deceives you, it gives you a wrong impression and makes you believe something that is not true.

example.ex: His gentle, kindly appearance did not deceive me...
example.tran: 我没有被他文雅和善的外表所蒙蔽。

example.ex: The boys, if my eyes did not deceive me, were praying.
example.tran: 如果我没有看错的话，那些男孩子正在祈祷。

means.word_mean: 1. be false to; be dishonest with
2. cause someone to believe an untruth;

sentences.sentence: "The insurance company deceived me when they told me they were covering my house"

auth_sentence.content: Your scam of deceive the common person is over.
auth_sentence.res_content: Your scam of deceive the common person is over.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Your scam of deceive the common person is over.

auth_sentence.content: Many bioluminescent animals use light to deceive their prey.
auth_sentence.res_content: Many bioluminescent animals use light to deceive their prey.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Many bioluminescent animals use light to deceive their prey.

auth_sentence.content: Shame on those who would deceive to make a buck.
auth_sentence.res_content: Shame on those who would deceive to make a buck.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Shame on those who would deceive to make a buck.

stems_affixes.word_buile: conceive[v.想象;构想;怀孕]+able可以……的→adj.可想象的
receive[[v.接受;收到]]eive变体为cip+ent……的;人或物等→recipient接受的;接受者
con共同+ceit=ceive拿,抓,握住→[自以为]全部抓到→自大
receive[[v.接受;收到]]eive变体为cip+ent……的;人或物等→recipient接受的;接受者
con共同+ceive抓→大家一起抓[思想]→构想

sentences.en: He deceived his friends about his income.
sentences.cn: 他在自己的收入问题上欺骗了朋友。

jushi.chinese: 在任何情况下都不要欺骗。
海伦有意地欺骗了汤姆。

jushi.english: You can't pass the term-end examinations without working hard, so you don't deceive yourself.
jushi.chinese: 你不用功就不能通过期末考试,你不能抱有侥幸心理。
